get.summary: Repository Quality API Provides quality predictions for GitHub repositories Serves both Echeo.io and Code-Beast.dev (BEAST MODE) platforms User Stories: - Echeo: "As a developer, I want my repo quality to factor into my trust score" - Echeo: "As a company, I want to verify repo quality before posting bounties" - BEAST MODE: "As a developer, I want instant quality scores for my repos" - BEAST MODE: "As a developer, I want to see what makes my repo high quality"
get.description: Repository Quality API Provides quality predictions for GitHub repositories Serves both Echeo.io and Code-Beast.dev (BEAST MODE) platforms User Stories: - Echeo: "As a developer, I want my repo quality to factor into my trust score" - Echeo: "As a company, I want to verify repo quality before posting bounties" - BEAST MODE: "As a developer, I want instant quality scores for my repos" - BEAST MODE: "As a developer, I want to see what makes my repo high quality"

post.summary: Repository Quality API Provides quality predictions for GitHub repositories Serves both Echeo.io and Code-Beast.dev (BEAST MODE) platforms User Stories: - Echeo: "As a developer, I want my repo quality to factor into my trust score" - Echeo: "As a company, I want to verify repo quality before posting bounties" - BEAST MODE: "As a developer, I want instant quality scores for my repos" - BEAST MODE: "As a developer, I want to see what makes my repo high quality"
post.description: Repository Quality API Provides quality predictions for GitHub repositories Serves both Echeo.io and Code-Beast.dev (BEAST MODE) platforms User Stories: - Echeo: "As a developer, I want my repo quality to factor into my trust score" - Echeo: "As a company, I want to verify repo quality before posting bounties" - BEAST MODE: "As a developer, I want instant quality scores for my repos" - BEAST MODE: "As a developer, I want to see what makes my repo high quality"

post.summary: Quality Validation API Validates that generated code meets quality standards.
post.description: Quality Validation API Validates that generated code meets quality standards.

post.summary: Codebase Themes & Opportunities API Analyzes codebase for bigger themes, opportunities, and architectural insights. Goes beyond file-by-file to identify systemic patterns.
post.description: Codebase Themes & Opportunities API Analyzes codebase for bigger themes, opportunities, and architectural insights. Goes beyond file-by-file to identify systemic patterns.

get.summary: GET /api/repos/quality/stats Get quality API statistics (cache hits, misses, etc.)
get.description: GET /api/repos/quality/stats Get quality API statistics (cache hits, misses, etc.)

get.summary: GET /api/repos/quality/monitoring Get quality API monitoring metrics
get.description: GET /api/repos/quality/monitoring Get quality API monitoring metrics

post.summary: Automated Quality Improvement API Improves repository quality from current score to target score. Phase 3: Automated Improvement Workflows
post.description: Automated Quality Improvement API Improves repository quality from current score to target score. Phase 3: Automated Improvement Workflows

get.summary: Quality Improvement History API Retrieves quality improvement history, trends, and snapshots from Supabase.
get.description: Quality Improvement History API Retrieves quality improvement history, trends, and snapshots from Supabase.

post.summary: Feature/Application Generation API Generates complete features or applications based on user requests and codebase context. Uses quality insights to create code that matches existing patterns.
post.description: Feature/Application Generation API Generates complete features or applications based on user requests and codebase context. Uses quality insights to create code that matches existing patterns.

post.summary: Quality-Driven Code Generation API Generates code (tests, CI/CD, docs) based on quality recommendations.
post.description: Quality-Driven Code Generation API Generates code (tests, CI/CD, docs) based on quality recommendations.

post.summary: File-Level Quality Analysis API Analyzes individual files in a repository and maps quality insights to specific code-level improvements.
post.description: File-Level Quality Analysis API Analyzes individual files in a repository and maps quality insights to specific code-level improvements.

post.summary: POST /api/repos/quality/export-pdf Export repository quality data as a stunning PDF zine User Stories: - "As a developer, I want to export my quality report as a beautiful PDF" - "As a team lead, I want to share quality insights in a professional format"
post.description: POST /api/repos/quality/export-pdf Export repository quality data as a stunning PDF zine User Stories: - "As a developer, I want to export my quality report as a beautiful PDF" - "As a team lead, I want to share quality insights in a professional format"

post.summary: POST /api/repos/quality/compare Compare quality scores between repositories User Stories: - "As a developer, I want to compare my repo quality to competitors" - "As a team lead, I want to see quality differences across projects"
post.description: POST /api/repos/quality/compare Compare quality scores between repositories User Stories: - "As a developer, I want to compare my repo quality to competitors" - "As a team lead, I want to see quality differences across projects"

post.summary: POST /api/repos/quality/batch Batch quality prediction endpoint User Stories: - "As a developer, I want to analyze multiple repos at once" - "As a team lead, I want to compare quality across my organization" Performance: Processes up to 50 repos in parallel
post.description: POST /api/repos/quality/batch Batch quality prediction endpoint User Stories: - "As a developer, I want to analyze multiple repos at once" - "As a team lead, I want to compare quality across my organization" Performance: Processes up to 50 repos in parallel

get.summary: Repository Benchmarking API Compares a repository against the dataset to show percentiles and rankings User Stories: - Echeo: "As a developer, I want to see how my repos compare to others" - BEAST MODE: "As a developer, I want to know my repo's percentile ranking"
get.description: Repository Benchmarking API Compares a repository against the dataset to show percentiles and rankings User Stories: - Echeo: "As a developer, I want to see how my repos compare to others" - BEAST MODE: "As a developer, I want to know my repo's percentile ranking"

get.summary: ML Prediction API Provides ML quality predictions with intelligent routing to specialized services Routing Strategy: 1. Try specialized service (Code Roach, Oracle, etc.) if context matches 2. Fall back to BEAST MODE ML model if available 3. Fall back to heuristics Month 3: Week 1 - First Mate Integration Phase 1, Week 1: Production Integration (Error Handling, Performance Monitoring, Caching) Phase 2: Service Integration - Specialized ML services
